Module it.polimi.ingsw
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class GameBoard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.GameBoard
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class GameBoard extends Object implements Serializable
This class contains all the "physical" elements of the game. Every game has one, and it is shared by both Normal and Expert game modes (Expert game exclusive "veto tiles" are present but unused - and not shown - in Normal mode).
See Also:

    • takeStudentsFromCloud

      public void takeStudentsFromCloud(int cloudID, Player curr) throws EmptyCloudException
      Takes all the students from the chosen cloud and moves them into the current player's hall.
      Parameters:
      cloudID - the given cloud ID.
      curr - the current player.
      Throws:
      EmptyCloudException - if the chosen cloud is empty (has already been chosen).

    • islandConquerCheck

      public void islandConquerCheck(Player currentPlayer, int islandID) throws IslandNotFoundException
      Checks: 1) if there's a veto tiles on the selected island (if there is one, it is removed and nothing else is done) - Expert mode exclusive. 2) if the owner of the selected island is different from the current player. In case it is true, calculates the owner's and the current player's influence: if the influence of the current player is higher than the owner's, the current player becomes the selected island's owner. 3) if two or three islands may be merged.
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - the current player.
      islandID - an int representing the ID of the island to check.
      Throws:
      IslandNotFoundException - if there is no island with the given ID.

    • islandConquerAlgorithm

      public static void islandConquerAlgorithm(Player currentPlayer, Island selectedIsland, int calcCurrent, int calcOwner, DoublyLinkedList islands)
      Changes the islands' status (owner, towers, students), if criteria are met.
      Parameters:
      currentPlayer - the current player.
      selectedIsland - the int representing the ID of the island to check.
      calcCurrent - the int representing the current player's influence on the island to check.
      calcOwner - the int representing the influence of the owner of the island to check.
      islands - the data structure containing the islands of the game board.

    • reassignIslandIDs

      public static void reassignIslandIDs(DoublyLinkedList islands)
      Reassigns the IDs of the islands after a merge operation.
      Parameters:
      islands - the data structure which needs ID reassignment.
